scripts.build:optimism-goerli: npm run codegen  && graph build --output-dir ./build/optimism-goerli --network optimism-goerli
scripts.build:optimism: npm run codegen  && graph build --output-dir ./build/optimism --network optimism
scripts.deploy:optimism: graph deploy --output-dir ./build/optimism --network optimism synthetixio-governance-subgraph --version-label v0.0.1 --node https://subgraphs.alchemy.com/api/subgraphs/deploy --deploy-key ${SUBGRAPH_KEY} --ipfs https://ipfs.satsuma.xyz --output-dir ./build/optimism --network optimism
